title: The 7 Most Interesting Questions About the NBA Finals | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Tjarks attempt to answer the seven most interesting questions about this season’s thrilling Lakers vs. Heat NBA Finals, including who the most important player in the series is (1:23), whether Erik Spoelstra is the best coach in the NBA (18:54), what the biggest takeaways from this postseason are (43:20), and whose legacy will be most impacted by the outcome of the NBA Finals (53:34). 

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, and Jonathan Tjarks
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
